TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ALSourcef extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: A list of valid 32-Bits Float Source/GetSource parameters

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef ConeInnerAngle = int32(4097)
ConeInnerAngle = 4097

Docs.summary: Directional Source, inner cone angle, in degrees. Range: [0-360] Default: 360

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef ConeOuterAngle = int32(4098)
ConeOuterAngle = 4098

Docs.summary: Directional Source, outer cone angle, in degrees. Range: [0-360] Default: 360

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef ConeOuterGain = int32(4130)
ConeOuterGain = 4130

Docs.summary: Directional Source, outer cone gain. Default: 0.0f Range: [0.0f - 1.0] (Logarithmic)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef EfxAirAbsorptionFactor = int32(131079)
EfxAirAbsorptionFactor = 131079

Docs.summary: (EFX Extension) This property is a multiplier on the amount of Air Absorption applied to the Source. The AL_AIR_ABSORPTION_FACTOR is multiplied by an internal Air Absorption Gain HF value of 0.994 (-0.05dB) per meter which represents normal atmospheric humidity and temperature. Range [0.0f .. 10.0f] Default: 0.0f

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef EfxConeOuterGainHighFrequency = int32(131081)
EfxConeOuterGainHighFrequency = 131081

Docs.summary: (EFX Extension) A directed Source points in a specified direction. The Source sounds at full volume when the listener is directly in front of the source; it is attenuated as the listener circles the Source away from the front. Range [0.0f .. 1.0f] Default: 1.0f

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef EfxRoomRolloffFactor = int32(131080)
EfxRoomRolloffFactor = 131080

Docs.summary: (EFX Extension) This property is defined the same way as the Reverb Room Rolloff property: it is one of two methods available in the Effect Extension to attenuate the reflected sound (early reflections and reverberation) according to source-listener distance. Range [0.0f .. 10.0f] Default: 0.0f

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef Gain = int32(4106)
Gain = 4106

Docs.summary: Indicate the gain (volume amplification) applied. Type: float. Range: [0.0f - ? ] A value of 1.0 means un-attenuated/unchanged. Each division by 2 equals an attenuation of -6dB. Each multiplicaton with 2 equals an amplification of +6dB. A value of 0.0f is meaningless with respect to a logarithmic scale; it is interpreted as zero volume - the channel is effectively disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef MaxDistance = int32(4131)
MaxDistance = 4131

Docs.summary: Indicate distance above which Sources are not attenuated using the inverse clamped distance model. Default: float.PositiveInfinity Type: float Range: [0.0f - float.PositiveInfinity]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef MaxGain = int32(4110)
MaxGain = 4110

Docs.summary: Indicate maximum Source attenuation. Type: float Range: [0.0f - 1.0f] (Logarthmic)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef MinGain = int32(4109)
MinGain = 4109

Docs.summary: Indicate minimum Source attenuation. Type: float Range: [0.0f - 1.0f] (Logarthmic)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef Pitch = int32(4099)
Pitch = 4099

Docs.summary: Specify the pitch to be applied, either at Source, or on mixer results, at Listener. Range: [0.5f - 2.0f] Default: 1.0f

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef ReferenceDistance = int32(4128)
ReferenceDistance = 4128

Docs.summary: Source specific reference distance. Type: float Range: [0.0f - float.PositiveInfinity] At 0.0f, no distance attenuation occurs. Type: float Default: 1.0f.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef RolloffFactor = int32(4129)
RolloffFactor = 4129

Docs.summary: Source specific rolloff factor. Type: float Range: [0.0f - float.PositiveInfinity]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourcef SecOffset = int32(4132)
SecOffset = 4132

Docs.summary: The playback position, expressed in seconds.
